narratives.evidence_quote: "Ninguém tem qualquer confiança nele. Todos compreendem perfeitamente que se trata de um homem que pode distorcer tudo, que pode mentir, que pode abandonar tudo, como abandonou até o seu próprio povo, atirando literalmente o povo da Ucrânia para um altar de sacrifício"
narratives.reasoning: This quote directly attacks the character and legitimacy of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, portraying him as a liar who has betrayed his own people. It undermines the Ukrainian leadership, which aligns with the narrative of discrediting Ukraine.

narratives.evidence_quote: "nem por Zelensky, nem pela sua administração ou por outros ramos do governo, nem pelos manipuladores ocidentais para revogar a lei que proíbe a Ucrânia de negociar com a Rússia."
narratives.reasoning: The term 'manipuladores ocidentais' (Western manipulators) is used to criticize and portray Western actors as deceitful and controlling, directly discrediting Western involvement and diplomatic efforts related to Ukraine.

narratives.evidence_quote: "Não há nada de novo na intenção do regime de Kiev e dos seus manipuladores ocidentais de se reabilitarem pela chamada cimeira de paz falhada."
narratives.reasoning: This quote dismisses peace summit efforts as a failed attempt at rehabilitation by the 'Kiev regime' and its Western manipulators, criticizing and undermining Western diplomatic initiatives and portraying them as insincere.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting Ukraine: Discrediting Ukrainian government and officials and policies
subnarratives.evidence_quote: "Ninguém tem qualquer confiança nele. Todos compreendem perfeitamente que se trata de um homem que pode distorcer tudo, que pode mentir, que pode abandonar tudo, como abandonou até o seu próprio povo, atirando literalmente o povo da Ucrânia para um altar de sacrifício"
subnarratives.reasoning: This quote directly attacks the character and trustworthiness of President Zelensky, portraying him as a liar who betrays his own people, which aligns with the definition of delegitimizing Ukrainian leaders.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting Ukraine: Ukraine is a puppet of the West
subnarratives.evidence_quote: "nem por Zelensky, nem pela sua administração ou por outros ramos do governo, nem pelos manipuladores ocidentais para revogar a lei que proíbe a Ucrânia de negociar com a Rússia."
subnarratives.reasoning: The term 'manipuladores ocidentais' (Western manipulators) frames Ukraine's actions as being directed by Western powers, supporting the narrative that Ukraine is not sovereign but a puppet.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting Ukraine: Discrediting Ukrainian military
subnarratives.evidence_quote: "Ouvimos muitas palavras, mas basicamente não vemos quaisquer atos. Bem, exceto o facto de Zelensky continuar a massacrar cidadãos ucranianos"
subnarratives.reasoning: The accusation that Zelensky is 'massacring Ukrainian citizens' implicitly discredits the Ukrainian military's actions and the government's conduct of the war, portraying them as harmful to their own population.

subnarratives.evidence_quote: "Por detrás disto está o desejo de impor a 'fórmula Zelensky', que é um beco sem saída, a um vasto leque de países"
subnarratives.reasoning: This statement supports the parent narrative by dismissing Ukraine's peace efforts as a 'dead end' and an imposition on other countries, which undermines Ukraine's diplomatic initiatives but does not fit neatly into the other specific subnarratives.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: Diplomacy does/will not work
subnarratives.evidence_quote: Não há nada de novo na intenção do regime de Kiev e dos seus manipuladores ocidentais de se reabilitarem pela chamada cimeira de paz falhada. Compreendemos que estas tentativas vão continuar. Por detrás disto está o desejo de impor a 'fórmula Zelensky', que é um beco sem saída, a um vasto leque de países
subnarratives.reasoning: This quote directly discredits diplomatic efforts, labeling the 'peace summit' as failed and Zelensky's formula as a 'dead end', asserting that such attempts will continue to be futile.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: The West does not care about Ukraine, only about its interests
subnarratives.evidence_quote: nem por Zelensky, nem pela sua administração ou por outros ramos do governo, nem pelos manipuladores ocidentais para revogar a lei que proíbe a Ucrânia de negociar com a Rússia
subnarratives.reasoning: The term 'Western manipulators' frames Western support not as genuine care for Ukraine, but as a controlling influence that prevents Ukraine from negotiating, implying the West is pursuing its own agenda.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: Other
subnarratives.evidence_quote: Ouvimos muitas palavras, mas basicamente não vemos quaisquer atos. Bem, exceto o facto de Zelensky continuar a massacrar cidadãos ucranianos
subnarratives.reasoning: This statement supports the parent narrative by discrediting Western/Ukrainian diplomacy as mere words without action, but its specific accusation of Zelensky 'massacring' Ukrainian citizens does not fit any of the other defined subnarratives. It is a distinct, manipulative claim that bolsters the overall discrediting theme.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: Diplomacy does/will not work
subnarratives.evidence_quote: Não há nada de novo na intenção do regime de Kiev e dos seus manipuladores ocidentais de se reabilitarem pela chamada cimeira de paz falhada. Compreendemos que estas tentativas vão continuar. Por detrás disto está o desejo de impor a 'fórmula Zelensky', que é um beco sem saída, a um vasto leque de países
subnarratives.reasoning: This quote directly discredits diplomatic efforts by labeling the 'peace summit' as failed and Zelensky's peace formula as a 'dead end', asserting that such attempts will continue to be futile.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: The West does not care about Ukraine, only about its interests
subnarratives.evidence_quote: nem por Zelensky, nem pela sua administração ou por outros ramos do governo, nem pelos manipuladores ocidentais para revogar a lei que proíbe a Ucrânia de negociar com a Rússia
subnarratives.reasoning: The term 'Western manipulators' frames Western support not as genuine care for Ukraine, but as a controlling influence pursuing its own agenda, preventing Ukraine from negotiating.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: Other
subnarratives.evidence_quote: Querem forçar literalmente todos, para envolver o maior número possível de países na sua discussão sob falsos pretextos
subnarratives.reasoning: This statement supports the parent narrative by accusing the West and Ukraine of using deceptive tactics to coerce other countries into supporting their diplomatic initiatives, which is a form of discrediting Western diplomacy but does not fit the specific definitions of the other subnarratives.
